text: Derek Robinson (born 31 July 1931) is a British former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:British male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Great Britain Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gravesend, Kent
title: Derek Robinson (sport shooter)
